actions.text: Referred to Joint Committee on Atomic Energy.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the transfer of nuclear materials to countries which have not ratified the treaty on Nonproliferation of Nuclear Weapons.

summary.text: Nuclear Non-Proliferation Act - Prohibits the transfer of nuclear materials to any country which has not ratified the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons unless the President determines, and the Congress by concurrent resolution approves, that such sale is essential to national security.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the transfer of nuclear materials to countries which have not ratified the treaty on Nonproliferation of Nuclear Weapons.
